column5: The 2014 hunting regs are in the stores now. As "lol BillM" has suggested, get a copy for your non-computer litereate among you as there are very few copies available.  Cheers, Mark
I've got ADD so I'm most definitely going to need a copy,  thanks for the heads-up Mark
Get your copies before there's a riot   I think I'll head down to Canadian Tire today and pick up mine.  Thanks for the heads up OP!
